name: Disconnected (Darlumochi)
description:
I created this game during my twenty day free trail on RPGmaker. This is the first game that I've made so any constructive feedback would be greatly appreciated. This game was made because I wanted to tell a story and it only contains minutes of gameplay.

Credits: This game uses certain assets made by the incredibly talented individuals,

SchwarneNacht /  PandaMaru - MV noble interior and MV bathroom addon

Ayene-chan - Door 1-2
